name: VMware vCloud Gov Service
short_description: VMware vCloud Government Service provided by Carpathia (vCGS) is a Government Community Cloud built on the award winning VMware vSphere platform.
long_description: VMware vCloud Government Service provided by Carpathia (vCGS) is a Government Community Cloud built on the award winning VMware vSphere platform.  vCGS provides the ability to run new and existing applications in the cloud, and binary compatibility enabling hybrid connections to on premise vSphere implementations.  vCGS offers on-demand compute, network, and storage resources via a self-service Portal or API.
